```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    histogram = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
        x='Random Numbers',
        y='count()'
    )
    return [df.head(), df.describe(), histogram]

preview_data(data)
```
